hero.title: Welcome to Cloudsmith's documentation site.
hero.description: Cloudsmith is a cloud-native, hosted, package management service with deep focus on providing the best universal support for all native package and container technologies.

sections.heading: Getting your Cloudsmith account up and running

cards.title: Getting Started Guide
cards.description: This guide will take you through the basic steps to help you get your Cloudsmith account up and running quickly.
